flawed_nl_solution:
Roberto skips 70.0 times per minute because 4200 / 60 = <<4200/60=70.0>>70.0.
Together they skip 150.0 times a minute.
They will skip 2520.0 times because 150.0 x 15 = <<150.0*15=2520.0>>2520.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2250.0, not 2520.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
